mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id,password, name, birthdate, image, email_id,email_domain, nickname,sex, area,phone_number, mbti) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name},#{birthdate}, #{image},#{emailId},#{emailDomain},#{nickname}, #{sex},#{area}, #{phoneNumber}, #{mbti})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, id, password, name, birthdate, image, email_id, email_domain, token, is_active, join_date, type, nickname, sex, area, phone_number, mbti FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, image = #{image}, email_id = #{emailId}, email_domain = #{emailDomain}, is_active = #{isActive}, type = #{type}, nickname = #{nickname}, sex = #{sex}, area = #{area}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, mbti = #{mbti} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE member SET token = #{token} WHERE id = #{id}
